V03vinv08_u:1_0: sāketena hi kasyacid vitaritaṃ marditaṃ (276r1 = GBM 6.
V03vinv08_u:1_1: 864) ca kālena pudgalo mātṛkāpadāny akṛtena viṃśatiḥ karaṇīyena dvādaśikā
V03vinv08_u:2_2: kardame uṣṇena klāntānāṃ cīvaraṃ tatra sammatam* // //
V03vinv08_u:3_0: Kaṭhina-v 1. buddho bhagavāṃ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
V03vinv08_u:3_1_0: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ sākete varṣopagatās trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ
V03vinv08_u:3_1_1: samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ carantaḥ
V03vinv08_u:3_1_2: śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya
V03vinv08_u:3_1_3: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ
V03vinv08_u:4_1: Kaṭhina-v 2. dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanta āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodante /
V03vinv08_u:4_3_0: kutra vā stha varṣā uṣitā iti pratisaṃmodate bhagavān āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā nayā
V03vinv08_u:4_3_1: kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchatha kutra vā stha varṣā uṣitāḥ te kathayaṃti sāketād vayaṃ bhadant';
V03vinv08_u:4_4_0: etarhy āgacchāma sākete vā sma varṣā uṣitāḥ kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sākete sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā stha klāntāḥ piṇḍakena
V03vinv08_u:4_4_1: tathyaṃ vayaṃ bhadanta [Matsumura_189] sāketa sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā smaḥ klāntāḥ piṇḍakenāpi tu vayaṃ samādāya
V03vinv08_u:4_4_2: pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ carantaḥ kṛcchreṇehānuprāptāḥ
V03vinv08_u:5_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 3. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati / klāmyanti bata me śrāvakāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyanti
V03vinv08_u:5_0_1: svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ caranto yanv ahaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:5_1_0: yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhināstare na daśāhaparamaṃ na māsaparamaṃ na rātrivipravāsāḥ sāntarottareṇa cīvareṇa janapadacārikāṃ
V03vinv08_u:5_2_0: apare 'pi paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ / na gaṇabhojanaṃ na [Matsumura_191] paraṃparabhojanaṃ na kuleṣv ānimantritacārikā yāvadāptaṃ cīvaraparyeṣaṇaṃ
V03vinv08_u:5_2_1: [Matsumura_192] kārtikān māsād yāvat phālguno māso atrāntarāt sāstṛtakaṭhinānāṃ lābha iti viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
V03vinv08_u:5_3_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo 'nujānāmi bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ varṣoṣitair bhikṣubhiḥ kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:5_3_1: āstartavyaṃ yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhine na daśāhaparamaṃ pūrvavad yāvad āstṛtakaṭhinānāṃ lābha iti
V03vinv08_u:6_0: Kaṭhina-v 4. uktaṃ bhagavatā kaṭhinam āstartavyam iti bhikṣavo na jānate katham [Matsumura_193] āstartavyam iti /
V03vinv08_u:6_1_0: bhagavān āha / yad varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpadyate tasmād āstartavyaṃ evaṃ ca punar āstartavyaṃ pūrvavat*
V03vinv08_u:6_1_1: sāmagryam ārocayitavyaṃ idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi saṃghasyābhirucitam anena cīvareṇa
V03vinv08_u:6_2_0: 865) āstariṣyati / tataḥ paścād aparasmin divase śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūṃ [Matsumura_194]
V03vinv08_u:6_2_1: samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam
V03vinv08_u:7_0: Kaṭhina-v 5. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam abhirucitaṃ anena cīvareṇa kaṭhinam āstarituṃ /
V03vinv08_u:7_1_0: yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt prakrāmantaḥ [Matsumura_195] purāṇacīvarāṇāṃ apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sacet
V03vinv08_u:7_1_1: saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmanyetānena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:7_1_2: āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmantaḥ purāṇacīvarāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānām ity eṣā
V03vinv08_u:8_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 6. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya cābhirucitaṃ kaṭhinaṃ
V03vinv08_u:8_0_1: kartuṃ tat saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmanyate anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt
V03vinv08_u:8_0_2: prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ [Matsumura_196] yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate idaṃ cīvaraṃ
V03vinv08_u:8_0_3: kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmantum anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt prakramataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām
V03vinv08_u:8_0_4: apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ saṃghena idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham anena
V03vinv08_u:8_0_5: cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati
V03vinv08_u:8_0_6: prāg eva navakānāṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīṃ evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:9_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 7. tataḥ paścāt kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ paṃcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmato
V03vinv08_u:9_0_1: na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ katamaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ avarṣiko varṣachinnakaḥ [Matsumura_197] paścimakāṃ varṣām upagato
V03vinv08_u:9_0_2: anyatra varṣoṣitaḥ śikṣādattakaḥ apare api paṃca na saṃmantavyāḥ pārivāsika mūlapārivāsika mānāpya mūlamānāpyacāra utkṣiptakaḥ
V03vinv08_u:9_0_3: apare paṃca na saṃmantavyā cchandād gacchati dveṣāṃ mohād bhayād gacchati āstṛtaṃ cānāstṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ na jānāti :
V03vinv08_u:9_1_0: paṃcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ katamaiḥ
V03vinv08_u:9_1_1: paṃcabhiḥ na cchandād gacchati na dveṣān na mohān na bhayād gacchati āstṛtānāstṛtaṃ ca kaṭhinaṃ jānāti
V03vinv08_u:10_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 8. evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad [Matsumura_198] yāvad utsāhayitavyaḥ utsahase
V03vinv08_u:10_0_1: tvam evaṃnāmā saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartum iti saced utsahate tena vaktavyaṃ utsahed iti /
V03vinv08_u:10_1: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:11_0: Kaṭhina-v 9a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartuṃ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho (277r1 = GBM 6.
V03vinv08_u:11_1: 866) yat saṃghaḥ evaṃnāmānaṃ kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyatīti eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:12_1_0: Kaṭhina-v 9b. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstāraka utsahe saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartuṃ tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ
V03vinv08_u:12_1_1: kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānaṃ
V03vinv08_u:12_1_2: kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmantuṃ evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ
V03vinv08_u:12_1_3: saṃghena evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:13_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 10. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakasya bhikṣor jñaptyā kaṭhinaṃ āstaritavyaṃ [Matsumura_200] śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ
V03vinv08_u:13_0_1: cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmatam ayaṃ caivaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmataḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt
V03vinv08_u:13_0_2: saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham evaṃnāmno bhikṣor anupradadyād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ
V03vinv08_u:14_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 11. kaṭhināstārakasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācārikāṃ dharmāṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinena sarvatra
V03vinv08_u:14_0_1: pūrvaṃgamena bhavitavyam* dhāvatā vitaratā cchindatā sīvatā raṃjayatā antato dvau trayo vā sūcīpadakā dātavyā dvau trayo
V03vinv08_u:15_0: Kaṭhina-v 12. tataḥ paścād āśvayujamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ ārocayitavyam* :
V03vinv08_u:15_2_0: yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇi pratyuddhartavyāni iti tataḥ kaṭhināstārakeṇa [Matsumura_202] bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gandhapuṣpānvitaṃ
V03vinv08_u:15_2_1: surabhidhūpadhūpitaṃ kṛtvā śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe
V03vinv08_u:15_2_2: sannipatite vṛddhānte sthāpayitavyaṃ tato vṛddhānte sthivā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā vaktavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:16_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 13. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinaṃ saṃmatam ahaṃ caivaṃnāmā bhikṣuḥ kaṭhināstārakaḥ so
V03vinv08_u:16_0_1: 'ham evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:16_1_0: evaṃ dvir api tṛr api tata āstīrya saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā evaṃ vaktavyaṃ samanvāhara sthavira idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena
V03vinv08_u:16_1_1: kaṭhinaṃ [Matsumura_203] saṃmatam ahaṃ caivaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tan mayā anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstṛtam iti
V03vinv08_u:17_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 14. tena vaktavyaṃ sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhas cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākam iti evaṃ dvir api tṛr api
V03vinv08_u:17_0_1: yāvat saṃghanavakasya sarvair vaktavyaṃ sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākam iti
V03vinv08_u:18_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 15. kaṭhināstārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā na prasrāvakuṭiṃ na varcaskuṭiṃ na dhūmāgāraṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nābhyavakāśe
V03vinv08_u:18_0_1: sthātavyaṃ na bahiḥsīmāṃ gantavyaṃ saced gacchati na tasyāṃ vastavyaṃ [Matsumura_204] kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān
V03vinv08_u:18_0_2: āsamudācārikāṃ dharmān na samādāya vartate sātisāro bhavati
V03vinv08_u:19_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 16. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā phālgunamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ punar ārocayitavyaṃ śvā āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:19_1: yaś ca tatra lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa saṃghena bhājayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv08_u:20_0: Kaṭhina-v 17. āyuśmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V03vinv08_u:20_1: katīnāṃ bhadanta kaṭhinam anāstṛtaṃ pañcānām upāliṃ avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ (277v1 = GBM 6.
V03vinv08_u:20_2: 867) varṣāṃ upagatasya anyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina āstīryamāṇe asaṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:20_3: apareṣām api paṃcānām anāstṛtaṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:21_2: pañcānām upālin avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ varṣām upagatasyānyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina astīryamāṇa saṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:21_3: apareṣām api pañcānāṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:22_0: Kaṭhina-v 19. kātīnāṃ bhadanta naiva lābho nānuśaṃsaḥ paṃcānām upāliṃ adarśanāyotkṣiptakasya apratikarmaṇāyotkṣiptakasya apratinisṛṣṭe /
V03vinv08_u:22_1: pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣiptakasya anyatra varṣoṣitasya bhinne ca saṃghe adharme pākṣikasya
V03vinv08_u:23_1: Kaṭhina-v 20. saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ carantaḥ corair muṣitās te 'nupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptā bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭāḥ svāgataṃ svāgataṃ āyuṣmantaḥ kaccit sukhacaryā /
V03vinv08_u:23_2: kīdṛśī āyuṣmantaḥ sukhacaryā corair muṣitāḥ smaḥ /
V03vinv08_u:23_3: asmākam āyuṣmantaḥ prabhūto lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi kaṭhinam uddhriyate cīvarair yuṣmākaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kurma iti /
V03vinv08_u:23_4: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti bhagavān āha /
V03vinv08_u:23_5_0: tasmād anujānāmi corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddhartavyaṃ evaṃ ca punar uddhartavyaṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ
V03vinv08_u:23_5_1: kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma
V03vinv08_u:24_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 21. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaḥ corair
V03vinv08_u:24_0_1: muṣitā āgatāḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:24_0_2: uddhared ity eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:25_1_0: Kaṭhina-v 22a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaś corair
V03vinv08_u:25_1_1: muṣitakā āgatās tat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddharati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate coramuṣitakānāṃ
V03vinv08_u:25_1_2: bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddharituṃ te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ uddhṛtaṃ saṃghena coramuṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya
V03vinv08_u:25_1_3: kaṭhinaṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /

V03vinv08_u:79_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 60. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi
V03vinv08_u:79_0_1: cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy nāpi cīvarakaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:80_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 61. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi
V03vinv08_u:80_0_1: cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti [Matsumura_229] sa tad ārabhate ārabdhaṃ cāsya naśyati tasya nāśanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ /
V03vinv08_u:81_0: Kaṭhina-v 62. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:81_1: samagreṇa ca saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtaṃ sa śṛṇoti samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtam iti śrutvā cābhyanumodate sādhūddhṛtaṃ suṣṭhūddhṛtam iti /
V03vinv08_u:82_0: Kaṭhina-v 63. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:82_1: tasya tatra gatasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ /
V03vinv08_u:83_0: yathāpi tatra gatasyety anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ evaṃ sanniṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ // 6 //
V03vinv08_u:86_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 64. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ vicikitsāsaṃtatir bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati
V03vinv08_u:86_0_1: karaṇīyena kiṃ nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti
V03vinv08_u:87_0: yathā vicikitsāsantatir ity anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ /
V03vinv08_u:90_0: Kaṭhina-v 65. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati paryeṣaṇāya pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:90_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ
V03vinv08_u:91_0: paryeṣanāyety anena viśeṣeṇa pūrvavad aparā dvādaśikā : // //
V03vinv08_u:92_0: Kaṭhina-v 66. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati deśānuprekṣī apunarāgamanāya tasya prakramaṇāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ /
V03vinv08_u:93_0_0: Kaṭhina-v 67.i. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ vicikitsāsantati deśānuprekṣī bahiḥsīmāṃ
V03vinv08_u:93_0_1: prakrāmati kin nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti
